@title StoreManager
 @dev StoreManager contract for managing stores, items and prices. One address could be managining only one store.

devdoc.details: StoreManager contract for managing stores, items and prices. One address could be managining only one store.

addAdminToMyStore(address).details: Grants specified address the admin rights for the store

params._address: user that will have admin rights

addNewItemToMyStore(uint256,string,uint2.details: Creates new item and adds it to the store

params._isoCurrency: currency identifier according to the ISO-4127 standard

createNewStore(string,address).details: Creates new store (only one store per account is allowed)

getItemInfo(uint256,uint256).details: Returns the basic information for the selected item in the store

params._itemId: identifier of the item in the store

getMyStoreInfo().details: Returns basic information for the store where sender is admin

getPriceForItemAtIndex(uint256,uint256,u.details: Returns the selected price entry for the item in the store

params._itemId: identifier of the item in the store

getStoreInfoById(uint256).details: Returns basic information for selected store

isStoreAdmin(uint256,address).details: Checks if the specified address has admin rights for the store

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removeAdminFromMyStore(address).details: Revokes admin rights for the store for the specified address

params._address: user that will have admin rights removed

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateItemPrice(uint256,uint256).details: Updates the price of the item under sender's store

params._itemId: identifier of the item whose price will be updated

devdoc.title: StoreManager
